entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 12:49 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.1°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
